manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: True & Tidy SPIN-800 TrueClean Mop & Bucket System The TrueClean Mop and Bucket System is a state-of-the-art cleaning system from True & Tidy. It has separate compartments for clean and dirty water, making sure that only clean water touches your floor all the time. The built-in brush system cleans and removes dirt from the mop pad with each spin.

What is the water capacity? 2.5 L water tank capacity for clean water, and another 2.5 L for dirty water How long is the handle? The handle is 47 inches long when fully extended. How does the wet and dry mopping work? Wet Mop Mode: Spin slowly, red indicator not visible. Dry Mop Mode: Spin fast, red indicator appears. Can I use cleaning solutions? Yes! You can use any cleaning solution with the SPIN-800 Mop & Bucket System! What is the size of the mop pad? The mop pad's size is 9 in x 9 in.

Previous page Separation of clean and dirty water so you are cleaning your floors with clean water every spin. The 360 degrees swivel mop head allows you to clean hard to reach surfaces easily. TO SPIN - Unlock and open the latch TO MOP - Lock the latch securely Hassle-free water refilling by pouring water into the inlet without opening the water compartment. The unit also comes with a drain plug for mess-free dirty water draining. Next page 1 Dual Tank System 2 360° Swivel Mop Head 3 Adjustable Handle 4 Easy Refill Water Inlet 5 Drain Plug
Separate Compartments for Clean and Dirty Water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You have to wet it very often
reviews.reviewText: This mop is amazing! I love that the dirty water is separate from the clean so you’re always using clean water & cleaner! The only thing I don’t like about it is that you have to wet it often or it dries up but I’ll take that over mopping with dirty water!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If You Hate Cleaning, Get This Mop
reviews.reviewText: I didn't know I needed a modern mop, until I purchased this mop. This mop has made cleaning up my home a breeze. No more hand wringing or mopping the floor with dirty water. And it was a great price, better than TikTok Shop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well if you’re like me and saw this type of mop on TT and then made a beeline over here to Amazon to check them out, then pay attention. There are hundreds (or more) of different generic brands of this type of mop…some with round heads and some with square (like this one). The best feature of these mops is having the dirty and clean water separate … I’ve always used 2 buckets 🪣 to mop because I just can’t stand the thought of mopping with dirty water 😵‍💫🤢 (I’m a tad OCD). I feel as though I have to be a bit careful with this mop/mop head..it feels like it could easily break (but hasn’t so far). The outlet for the dirty water is small and hard at first to pull out…the more you do it the easier it gets as it loosens just a tad. The hole where you add the clean water is small…really small, so that’s kind of a pain 🤷🏼‍♀️. Since I feel like I have to be a bit careful with it, I haven’t really been able to put some elbow grease in it, but since the mop head is flat and soft with almost no texture, you’ll want to be sure to use a good cleaning solution and really warm (or hot) water for it to be effective at getting up dried on or sticky stuff. It does work really well for walls, too…which sounds funny, but you’d be amazed at how much cleaner and fresher smelling a room is just by ‘mopping’ the walls, especially when you’re using a cleaner that smells good.I’ve tried several versions of this type of mop, and this is the only one I actually kept. You get one extra pad…wish it was more, but they’re washable.👍🏻👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy this is to use and clean out after I'm done! It's light even when full of water, which is great for me because I have chronic back pain & other physical issues. Even mopping, my back didn't hurt, which it usually did because of how heavy other mops would be with water.VERY easy to use, and it all stores inside the bucket when the handle is disassembled, which saves a ton of room!Floors dry so much faster, and get so much cleaner with LESS effort. You don't have to buy special cleaners, which is another plus. It came with 2 mop pads, which are machine washable, and are good for up to 100 washes in the laundry according to the box.I've already recommended this mop system to my parents, and friends. I won't ever buy another sponge mop again! I actually enjoy cleaning my floors now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The TikTok mop
reviews.reviewText: So like everyone else I was super curious about this mop because of TikTok. It’s a good mop but there is some room for improvements.1. I like that it’s a pad instead of a mop head. It doesn’t get hair all tangled in it. It also has a brush that when you spin to clean the mop and get water the brush will take off any hair or dust trapped on the mop pad. I like that feature a lot.2. To drain it not as easy as it should be. There is this small hole with a plastic plug that you need to pull and pull hard in order to take it out. If you’re clumsy like me this might end up getting you to spill some of the dirty mop water. Where the dirty water goes to is separated in one corner because of the mechanism of where you put the water into. This lead to have to continuously swivel the bucket around trying to get the water back to the side where the drain plug is.3. The hole to put water into is pretty small. That leaves room for spilling the water and cleaning products as you’re loading it into there. Good thing is you’re moping anyways so it’s a quick mess to clean up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money
reviews.reviewText: Was so excited about this purchase but after using it only one time the spin part of the mop broke? Followed ALL instructions so it was used properly it just broke so very disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is THE ONE
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many other mops over the years, but this one is the one that has actually gotten me to start mopping regularly. It's so easy to use, uses very little water, the floors dry so quickly. It solves so many of the problems that I've had with other mops. I have ADHD, so the executive functioning required for most other mops is so high. This one I squirt a bit of cleaner in the hole, take it to the sink to put in some water, dampen the pad, give it a few spins to get cleaner on it, and then I'm off! I even used it without sweeping or vacuuming last time, and I had to be careful not to leave cat fur behind, but it picks up the fur very well! Then at the end, a few rinses, dump and rinse the bucket, and I've been washing the pads by hand to extend the life, but love that they are machine washable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m loving it.

reviews.reviewText: A week ago I would have given this mop 5 stars… my floors have never been cleaner and it’s so easy to use and I love the two filter system with the brush to get off the dirt you missed while sweeping. I’ve only used it a handful amount of times, and the latest time a part on the handle randomly broke off. I contacted the manufacturer (True and Tidy) under warranty and they said they had a marketing program happening where they would replace the broken part and send me an extra mop head if I gave them a five star review. I thought why not might as well get an extra mop head so I did as much they then contacted me to say that I had to pay the shipping and duty fees on the replacement part and it was gonna be $25 but they would split it with me. After paying $100 a month ago for this mop, brand new and only used a handful amount of times, I thought that was ridiculous to bribe someone into thinking that if they gave this product a good review they would replace it (which is required under warranty) but also give them a bonus. I said I am not paying $12 for something that should be covered fully under warranty and now they won’t respond to my emails. I am now returning the entire mop to Amazon and getting a whole new one but I was trying to help the environment by just getting their replacement part and saving the company money because it is a good product. Now my old mop is going in a land fill when they could have just sent me a tiny replacement part. Lesson learned, next time I’ll just go straight to Amazon. The mop works great but the quality of it sucks. I’m hoping this one lasts longer than a month.

reviews.reviewTitle: El piso nunca ha estado más limpio
reviews.reviewText: Tengo 3 perros, sueltan pelo y uno de ellos es un cachorro que hace pipí en todas partes, esto lo limpia bastante bien.El único detalle es que no llega muy bien a las esquinas y el cepillo que tiene la cubeta no limpia los lados de la mopa
The metal handle has a very strong smell

El concepto me pareció maravilloso, sumamente caro, pero pensé valía la pena. Al final fue dinero tirado a la basura. No sirvió ni tres veces, el mecanismo dejo de girar y simplemente ya no sirve para nada. No lo recomiendo para nada.
